summary: Researchers analyze new evidence in the fatal 1993 conflict at Mount Carmel in Waco, TX between the Branch Davidians and the FBI, the ATF, and the Texas National Guard.
cast: Gene Cullen|Misty Ferguson|Misty Riddle|Rita Riddle|Frederic Whitehurst|Graeme Craddock|Clive Doyle|David Koresh
title: Waco: A New Revelation
